overview:
An Evangelist in the technology sense, Tien Soon â€“ one of the co-founders of Open Dynamics, is a timezone transporter, in charge of consultancy and training services, enterprise support, and community building for Joget Workflow, in all areas outside of the US.

Tien Soon is also a tech speaker at some FOSS and open source conferences in Southeast Asia. Not forgetting, the community-driven BarCamp too.

In TMS Software, he has spent several years in system design, development, implementation and product planning for enterprise-scale knowledge management (KM), content, collaboration and learning management portals. Throughout his involvement in this profile, he had participated in successful implementation of enterprise knowledge portal for enterprises, banks, government linked companies, and government agencies in Malaysia.

degrees.subject: IT majoring in Information System Engineering
